title: Bridge Clearance
desc:
The 2013 Bells project team created the Bell Towers visualization in order to display the location of all of the bell towers in Venice. Depending on the amount of available information about each individual bell tower, the icons for each bell tower are colored differently. Users can then click on each icon in order to hear the bell audio and get more information about the bell tower.

Click on the floating button in the bottom right-hand corner to check it out!
